item.title: 五个危险的断层线划分特朗普和Zelensky
item.description: Five dangerous fault lines divide Trump and Zelenskyvia Five dangerous fault lines divide Trump and Zelensky_uxOn August 18th Volodymyr Zelensky, Ukraine’s president, will enter the White House to meet Donald Trump and discuss ending the war in乌克兰。对于Zelensky先生来说，这是一个危险的时刻。自从特朗普先生与俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京（Vladimir Putin）遇见以来，八月在阿拉斯加遇到了…… < /blockquote>
